alert.note: Alert for Edgefield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Edgefield County through 400 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Hamilton Branch State Park, or 16 miles north of Martinez, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Colliers, Lick Fork Campground, Mt Vintage, Poverty Hill, and Murphys Estates. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
